r.s: This package provides a management frontend for events inside the UNL_UCBCN system.
r.d: This class extends the UNL UCBerkeley Calendar backend system to create a management frontend. It handles authentication for the user and allows insertion of event details into the calendar backend.
r.n: Initial Release... this is really bare-bones. * Integration with Auth * Create Event form. * Default template for the manager.
